title: OARSOME: Pranksters speed down sports' store escalator in a KAYAK before crashing into clothing
text:
This is the moment two friends used a kayak to slide down a moving escalator inside a department store.

The shocking footage was filmed on October 27 in a large sports store, in Illinois in the US.

The friends speed down the tall escalator, after being pushed down by another companion.

As they get to the bottom, they shoot off the escalator and slam into a clothes display.

Hangers fall to the floor and a mannequin also drops, as the pranksters clamber to their feet.

The footage seems to have been filmed by another friend, who laughs as they watch the action unfold, before pulling the camera away.

The friends were filmed as they sped down the escalator at the sports store in Illinois in a kayak

They travelled down the tall escalator at high speed, as stunned onlookers watched them

The store doesn't seem to be that busy and the escalator is deserted as the pranksters speed down it.

However, there are some customers shopping during the stunt, with a few watching the action as they gaze down from the second floor.

The pranksters seem unhurt after their journey down the escalator.

As they get to the bottom, they shoot off the escalator and slam into a clothes display, knocking over clothes racks
description: The shocking footage of the friends speeding down a tall escalator in a kayak before crashing into a clothes rack was filmed on October 27 in a large sports store, in Illinois in the US.
